casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Scott PALMENTA Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 18, 2016

David B. Bachman, in support of the petition.

Toni M. Smith-Rosario, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 168 Conn.App. 37, 144 A.3d 503 (2016), is dismissed.

EVELEIGH, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
